Wait a second...
3 skins released at the same time with a shuriman theme? 
Shuriman theme? Shurima is a desert, pyramids are in the desert. 
PYRAMIDS!!! 
The third skin shown from left to right is xerath
xerath is the only one in all three screenshots
xerath's third ability (counting his passive), his w, is called EYE of destruction, which was CONVENIENTLY left out.
EYES AND PYRAMIDS!?!
...
skins are illuminati
and you turn the v of {{champion:161}}  it makes: <el a triangle with an e in the middle.
Eye starts with e.
Half Life 3 Confirmed

My story involving this champs. :P
Nice job with these. I laughed so hard at the Ramus part :D
Thank you.

{{champion:72}} First I had to work for that jerk {{champion:112}}, now this? What's next, you're gonna dress me up as a clown?

{{champion:35}} Nah, that's *my* job.

{{champion:33}} But you're not a clown. Your a psychopathic serial killer. Why are you even here? Like, shouldn't you be in prison?

{{champion:35}} **brandishes shivs**

{{champion:33}} ...I mean, ok.

{{champion:101}} Yeah, I'd agree. I mean I think my lore says something about me being evil, so why would I be guarding the desert?

{{champion:75}} None of us have had a lore since the rework anyway. To be honest, at this point I can't even tell who I am.

{{champion:268}} I thought you were that dog that hits things alot.

{{champion:75}} At this point, that might be a better lore than my current one.

{{champion:72}} Intruder! Kill!
{{champion:33}} Ok
Me:Wait! I'm looking for an ancient being of treacherous power!
{{champion:72}} Oh sorry, you want the next temple over
Me: Thanks!
{{champion:33}} Ok
No buy all 3 bundle? or + Kha' for 4? C'mon.
That Xerath skin looks like a sandy deal to me.

Sandy deal?
"Okay" -Rammus 2015

{{champion:121}} Finally my brothers are here. 

{{champion:33}} Yep

{{champion:121}} What took you guys so long.

{{champion:101}} Well Skarner had to use the bathroom and-

{{champion:72}} They left me at the gas station with a 40 year-old lady who kept talking about her cats which I ate.

{{champion:101}} Look I said I was sorry but next time use the dang bathroom.

{{champion:72}} Coming from the guy who took 2 hours to get himself fixed up at the motel.

{{champion:121}} Alright we get it. The point is your here and we can protect the desert of evil.

{{champion:33}} Hmm

{{champion:72}} Wait what evil are we fighting. In fact what evil can someone do in the desert.

{{champion:9}} He He He eeh well why don't you ask me.

{{champion:121}} Ah the evil get him.

{{champion:101}} Eat my sandy lighting bolts.

{{champion:72}} Stinging time.

{{champion:33}} I'm gonna break my horn in your head.
I thought rammus only said "Okay" {{champion:33}}
He says yeah and alright too
along with the occasional "Right"
{{champion:268}} *stares patiently*
Laughed a lot because of this comment.
laughed so hard when ramus said "im gonna break my horn on your head".
"These guys guard the temple next to that one"

So now there are 2 {{champion:101}} ??
one being the being of treacherous power in the tomb within the temple within the ruined kingdom lost within the desert.. and the other one guarding the temple adjacent to that temple?..
no wait there are 3 {{champion:101}} one that fought in the rune wars as well...
battlecast {{champion:101}} seems like a parallel time line, and scorched earth seems like the apocalyptic shuriman war one..
and there are now 4 guardians of the sands. 
4x5=20
2+0=2
there are 2 {{champion:268}} skins.
the second {{champion:268}} skin is from space.
the guardians of the galaxy are from space.
{{champion:17}} {{champion:111}} {{champion:75}} {{champion:58}} {{champion:68}} have space skins. 
there are 5 guardians of the galaxy. there are 6 space skins.
5=pentakill
6=hexakill
6-5=1
one for all.
all for one.
there are 3 words.
now there are 4.
4-3=1.
again.
april is the 4th month. the first three weeks.
URF.
OMG URF WILL COME BACK.
ALSO ILLUMINATI.
AND HALF LIFE 3.
OMG OMG OMG OMG OMG OMG.
EVERYBODY HATES {{champion:17}}
